snippet: T. J. Casner scored Clemson’s fourth straight penalty kick to outlast sixth-seeded Syracuse, 4-1, on penalty kicks in the N.C.A.A. College Cup semifinals.
abstract: Clemson advances to NCAA College Cup finals by beating Syracuse, 4-1; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: T. J. Casner scored Clemson’s fourth straight penalty kick to outlast sixth-seeded Syracuse, 4-1, on penalty kicks in the N.C.A.A. College Cup semifinals.
